00017 //! \addtogroup operator_schur
00018 //! @{
00019 
00020 
00021 // operator %, which we define it to do a schur product (element-wise multiplication)
00022 
00023 
00024 //! element-wise multiplication of Base objects with same element type
00025 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00026 arma_inline
00027 const eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_schur>
00028 operator%
00029   (
00030   const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X,
00031   const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T2>& Y
00032   )
00033   {
00034   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00035   
00036   return eGlue<T1, T2, eglue_schur>(X.get_ref(), Y.get_ref());
00037   }
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041 //! element-wise multiplication of Base objects with different element types
00042 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00043 inline
00044 const mtGlue<typename promote_type<typename T1::elem_type, typename T2::elem_type>::result, T1, T2, glue_mixed_schur>
00045 operator%
00046   (
00047   const Base< typename force_different_type<typename T1::elem_type, typename T2::elem_type>::T1_result, T1>& X,
00048   const Base< typename force_different_type<typename T1::elem_type, typename T2::elem_type>::T2_result, T2>& Y
00049   )
00050   {
00051   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00052   
00053   typedef typename T1::elem_type eT1;
00054   typedef typename T2::elem_type eT2;
00055   
00056   typedef typename promote_type<eT1,eT2>::result out_eT;
00057   
00058   promote_type<eT1,eT2>::check();
00059   
00060   return mtGlue<out_eT, T1, T2, glue_mixed_schur>( X.get_ref(), Y.get_ref() );
00061   }
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065 //! @}
